# Drone News 48h Brief — December 19, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 51 incidents._

## Summary
Over the past 48 hours, various drone incidents have emerged, primarily concerning smuggling and security enforcement efforts across different regions. Notably, multiple reports highlight the continued use of drones for smuggling contraband into prisons, particularly in the UK and the US, indicating an ongoing trend of unauthorized drone deliveries to inmates. In contrast, significant military drone operations were reported in Ukraine, where Russia has conducted numerous strikes. Japan has also taken steps to enhance drone regulation amid heightened terror risks. Policy responses are evident, particularly with Trump's recent legislation permitting police to disable drones at specific events, reflecting growing concerns over unauthorized usage. These incidents collectively underscore the multifaceted role drones play in both criminal activities and security measures.

**By category:** airport: 1 • arrest: 2 • crash: 2 • other: 23 • smuggling: 17 • surveillance: 1 • terrorism: 5
**Top queries:** drone smuggling (12), drone illegal (10), drone incident (9), drone terrorism (8), unauthorized drone (4)
